title: "Levels"
body: Does anyone know why I can't post under certain things? What is this level system? How do I level up?

replies.body: Your account needs to sync to the boards when posting for the first time, and usually a post will do just that.  It looks like you're showing as level 30 now!  Let me know if you have any issues posting!
I've been told it's directly related to my in-game level, but I've been level 30 for 5 months... :/
